nodes.text: Not an “Achievement Gap”, a Racial Capitalist Chasm https://t.co/CJIpvVe8oD

“We Want to Do More Than Survive” by Bettina Love compares the “achievement gap” to sharecropping: “Dark students and their families are sharecroppers, never able to make up the cost or close the gap because they are learning in a state of perpetual debt with no relief in sight.”
